2.4.1. Line Load¶

LineLoad(no, nodes_no, comment*, params*)¶

  • Parameters

    • no (int): Line Tag
    • nodes_no (str): Tags of Nodes
    • comment ( str, optional): Comments
    • params (dict, optional): Parameters
